docs: Select Options are components that are child elements of a Select. Each option defined is passed and displayed in the Select dialog. For more information, see the [Select docs](../select).

props.name: disabled
props.docs: If `true`, the user cannot interact with the select option. This property does not apply when `interface="action-sheet"` as `ion-action-sheet` does not allow for disabled buttons.

props.name: value
props.docs: The text value of the option.
